item.description:
Introducing a personal friend of many of us meetup folks, our own Ann Marie King as the opening performer with Jim Colliton & Larry Myles.

Ann Marie King is the girl next door.

Her stand up comedy is a clever blend of expressive and witty worldly observations with a unique comic style.  Quirky and endearing, she can also melt your heart with a lovely ballad.

She has also been charming audiences for years in musical theater.  Favorite roles include Peg in "Peg O' My Heart", Bianca in "Taming of the Shrew" and for the last 8 years playing wacky bridesmaid Louisa Ravioli in the long running hit "Joey & Maria's Comedy Italian Wedding",.Ann Marie's songs will break your heart, but her comedy will mend it!

JIM COLLITON

Jim’s comedy is funny, but also clean.

This has helped him stay busy working all across the country.   Jim has been seen on national television shows like Ed McMahon’s Next Big Star, Comcast Comedy Spot Light and Comedy Central Laugh Riots.  Jim can also be heard on XM Satellite Radio’s Comedy Channel

LARRY MYLES

"One of the best kept secrets in Boston, it's just a matter of time before Larry Myles achieves national notoriety.  "Like the amiable wise guy you met at the local bar you love to hear complain about the Red Sox.  He also has a keen topical sense.  I just got back from Los Angeles, it's such a big city.  If you want to go anywhere you have to drive.  Nobody walks in L.A. unless, of course, you're a celebrity accused of murder."  (The Boston Globe)

Though he often plays the edge, the talented comedian never crosses the boundaries of good taste. In fact, Larry's funniest jokes were also the cleanest.  He's a scream."  (New York News Day)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pay online at Tupelo Music Hall in advance $18 + $3. handling.

http://tickets.tupelohall.com/eventperformances.asp?evt=34

Although we cannot reserve tables, I have designated tables # 2 and # 3 for us to sit at. BUT you MUST select seats at these tables when paying online. Call me if you have questions about seating selection. 603 759-9876
item.how_to_find_us: Come to your reserved seat in the front. Look for the Meetup sign.
item.name: Comedy night at the Tupelo Music Hall – BYOB Venue!!!
